Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oA careful analysis with symmetry finder \
software -that was not available at the time of publication- and exchanges with colleagues who drew myattention to the issue, reveal that the C8 allotrope is nothing
else than diamond expressed in another space group but whose primitive cell is that of diamond. So there's no point in presenting well known results of tetragonal octacarbonC8\u00a7r
